article.Heading: How much budgetary support will Jaitley give to railways?
article.Summary: Even as some experts raise questions about what this will do to the railways' autonomy, CNBC-TV18 tries to gauge just how much budgetary support Finance Minister Arun Jaitley will give his colleague Railways Minister Suresh Prabhu.
article.Body:
For the first time in over 90 years, there won't be a separate Railway Budget this year.

But even as some experts raise questions about what this will do to the Railways' autonomy, CNBC-TV18 tries to gauge just how much budgetary support Finance Minister Arun Jaitley will give his colleague - Railway Minister Suresh Prabhu this time.

CNBC-TV18's Ashpreet Sethi brings you the full report. 

Watch video for more.
